meanings.definition: A simplified drawing showing the appearance, structure, or workings of something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used diagrams to explain how the heart works.
meanings.sent2: I always find it easier to understand science with the help of diagrams.
meanings.sent3: The diagrams in the textbook made the lesson more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of interconnected diagrams.
meanings.sent5: The diagrams on the board made the concept crystal clear.

meanings.sent1: The project manager created diagrams to organize the tasks.
meanings.sent2: The diagrams of the city's infrastructure were very detailed.
meanings.sent3: The diagrams for the event layout were surprisingly artistic.
meanings.sent4: His strategy was like a series of interconnected diagrams leading to success.
meanings.sent5: The diagrams of the solar system were displayed in the science fair.
